highlight_blocking_render.name: `blocking="render"`
highlight_blocking_render.description: Block rendering (but not parsing) until certain resources have been loaded. Available on `<link>`, `<script>` and `<style>`.
highlight_blocking_render.descriptionHtml: Block rendering (but not parsing) until certain resources have been loaded. Available on <link>, <script> and <style>.
highlight_blocking_render.descriptionClean: Block rendering (but not parsing) until certain resources have been loaded. Available on <link>, <script> and <style>.

example.codeHighlighted: <script blocking="render" async src="async-script.js"></script>

resources.title: Review request on `blocking=render` attribute for scripts and stylesheets 路 Issue #727 路 w3ctag/design-reviews 路 GitHub

webFeature.description_html: The blocking="render" attribute for <link>, <script>, and <style> elements blocks rendering until the external script or stylesheet has been loaded. For <link rel="expect">, rendering is blocked until a specific element is in the DOM.
webFeature.name: blocking="render"
